column2:
```r
min_cal <- menu %>%
  select(Category,
         Item,
         Calories)%>% 
  filter(Calories>0) %>% 
  group_by(Item) %>% 
  arrange(Calories)%>% 
  head(10) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(Calories,
             y = reorder(Item,
                         Calories),
             fill =Item)) + 
  geom_col() + 
  theme_classic()+ 
  theme(legend.position = \none\") +

column1: scale_fill_brewer(palette = \"Set3\") + ggtitle(\"TOP 10 McDonald's Menu Item with Low Calorie Content\")
